verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> if you have become collateral <S%H6148><s%> for your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> if you have struck <S%H8628><s%> your hands <S%H3709><s%> in pledge for a stranger; <S%H2114><s%>
You are trapped <S%H3369><s%> by the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%> You are ensnared <S%H3920><s%> with the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Do <S%H6213><s%> this now, <S%H645><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> yourself, <S%H935><s%> since you have come into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> humble <S%H7511><s%> yourself. <S%H7292><s%> Press your plea with your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> no sleep <S%H8142><s%> to your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> nor slumber <S%H8572><s%> to your eyelids. <S%H6079><s%>
Free <S%H5337><s%> yourself, <S%H6643><s%> like a gazelle from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the hunter, <S%H6833><s%> like a bird from the snare <S%H3027><s%> of the fowler. <S%H3353><s%>
Go <S%H3212><s%> to the ant, <S%H5244><s%> you sluggard. <S%H6102><s%> Consider <S%H7200><s%> her ways, <S%H1870><s%> and be wise; <S%H2449><s%>
which having no chief, <S%H7101><s%> overseer, <S%H7860><s%> or ruler, <S%H4910><s%>
provides <S%H3559><s%> her bread <S%H3899><s%> in the summer, <S%H7019><s%> and gathers <S%H103><s%> her food <S%H3978><s%> in the harvest. <S%H7105><s%>
How long will you sleep, <S%H7901><s%> sluggard? <S%H6102><s%> When will you arise <S%H6965><s%> out of your sleep? <S%H8142><s%>
A little <S%H4592><s%> sleep, <S%H8142><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> slumber, <S%H8572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> folding <S%H2264><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> to sleep: <S%H7901><s%>
so your poverty <S%H7389><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> as a robber, <S%H1980><s%> and your scarcity <S%H4270><s%> as an armed <S%H4043><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
A worthless <S%H1100><s%> person, <S%H120><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of iniquity, <S%H205><s%> is he who walks <S%H1980><s%> with a perverse <S%H6143><s%> mouth; <S%H6310><s%>
who winks <S%H7169><s%> with his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> who signals <S%H4448><s%> with his feet, <S%H7272><s%> who motions <S%H3384><s%> with his fingers; <S%H676><s%>
in whose heart <S%H3820><s%> is perverseness, <S%H8419><s%> who devises evil <S%H7451><s%> continually, <S%H6256><s%> who always <S%H6256><s%> sows <S%H7971><s%> discord. <S%H4066><s%>
Therefore his calamity <S%H343><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> suddenly. <S%H6597><s%> He will be broken <S%H7665><s%> suddenly, <S%H6621><s%> and that without remedy. <S%H4832><s%>
There are six <S%H8337><s%> things which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hates; <S%H8130><s%> yes, <S%H7651><s%> seven which are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to him: <S%H5315><s%>
haughty <S%H7311><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue, <S%H3956><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> that shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%>
a heart <S%H3820><s%> that devises <S%H2790><s%> wicked <S%H205><s%> schemes, <S%H4284><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> that are swift <S%H4116><s%> in running <S%H7323><s%> to mischief, <S%H7451><s%>
a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> who utters <S%H6315><s%> lies, <S%H3577><s%> and he who sows <S%H7971><s%> discord <S%H4090><s%> among brothers. <S%H251><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>'s commandment, <S%H4687><s%> and don't <S%H5203><s%> forsake your mother <S%H517><s%>'s teaching. <S%H8451><s%>
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them continually <S%H8548><s%> on your heart. <S%H3820><s%> Tie <S%H6029><s%> them around your neck. <S%H1621><s%>
When you walk, <S%H1980><s%> it will lead <S%H5148><s%> you. <S%H7901><s%> When you sleep, it will watch <S%H8104><s%> over you. <S%H6974><s%> When you awake, it will talk with you. <S%H7878><s%>

For the commandment <S%H4687><s%> is a lamp, <S%H5216><s%> and the law <S%H8451><s%> is light. <S%H216><s%> Reproofs <S%H8433><s%> of instruction <S%H4148><s%> are the way <S%H1870><s%> of life, <S%H1870><s%>
to keep <S%H8104><s%> you from the immoral <S%H7451><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> from the flattery <S%H2513><s%> of the wayward wife <S%H5237><s%>'s tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
Don't <S%H2530><s%> lust after her beauty <S%H3308><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> neither let her captivate <S%H3947><s%> you with her eyelids. <S%H6079><s%>

For a <S%H802><s%> prostitute <S%H2181><s%> reduces <S%H1157><s%> you to a piece <S%H3603><s%> of bread. <S%H3899><s%> The adulteress <S%H802><s%> hunts <S%H6679><s%> for your precious <S%H3368><s%> life. <S%H5315><s%>
Can a man <S%H376><s%> scoop <S%H2846><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> into his lap, <S%H2436><s%> and his clothes <S%H899><s%> not be burned? <S%H8313><s%>
Or can one <S%H376><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> on hot coals, <S%H1513><s%> and his feet <S%H7272><s%> not be scorched? <S%H3554><s%>
So is he who goes in <S%H935><s%> to his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife. <S%H802><s%> Whoever touches <S%H5060><s%> her will not be unpunished. <S%H5352><s%>
Men don't <S%H936><s%> despise a thief, <S%H1590><s%> if he steals <S%H1589><s%> to satisfy <S%H4390><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> when he is hungry: <S%H7456><s%>
but if he is found, <S%H4672><s%> he shall restore <S%H7999><s%> seven <S%H7659><s%> times. <S%H5414><s%> He shall give all the wealth <S%H1952><s%> of his house. <S%H1004><s%>
He who commits adultery <S%H5003><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%> He who does <S%H6213><s%> it destroys <S%H7843><s%> his own soul. <S%H5315><s%>
He will get <S%H4672><s%> wounds <S%H5061><s%> and dishonor. <S%H7036><s%> His reproach <S%H2781><s%> will not be wiped away. <S%H4229><s%>
For jealousy <S%H7068><s%> arouses the fury <S%H2534><s%> of the husband. <S%H1397><s%> He won't <S%H2550><s%> spare in the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance. <S%H5359><s%>
He won't <S%H5375><s%> regard any ransom, <S%H3724><s%> neither will he rest content, <S%H14><s%> though you give many <S%H7235><s%> gifts. <S%H7810><s%>
